product_name: The North Face Canyonlands Full-Zip Fleece Jacket - Men's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: A combination of warmth, freedom of movement and abrasion-resistance makes the men's Canyonlands Full-Zip Fleece Jacket from The North Face ideal for climbing, biking or hiking.
